trigger_description: This trigger fires when the temperature for a specific device becomes lower than the specified threshold.
This trigger fires when the CO₂ level for a specific devices exceeded a specified threshold.
This trigger fires when the CO₂ level for a specific devices becomes lower than the specified threshold.
This trigger fires when the humidity for a specific device becomes higher than the specified threshold.
This trigger fires when the temperature for a specific device exceeds the specified threshold.
This trigger fires when the humidity for a specific device becomes lower than the specified threshold.
